name: Gizmo Creative Factory
description:
Strategizing technical solutions and creating designs that communicate well are the hallmarks of my 20 +years in design and website creation. Lately I’ve brought in my copywriting skills to speed clients to a well-written site too.
I’ve worked with many verticals, most notably healthcare, technology, nonprofits and associations, and restaurants and events.
Some of my best clients are design firms and ad agencies. I come in as a freelancer and work as an arm of your company.
I travel internationally, speaking on WordPress, branding, developer fatigue and freelancing. I’m lucky to be location independent, though I’m primarily based in Chicago.
